items.content_text: ### Africa / Nigeria 🇳🇬 > Awesome speakers in the programming and design communities Let's make it more transparent and easy to find awesome speakers for meetups and conferences! This list of speakers, their contact details and the topics they talk about is a start towards this goal. Please add to the list and help make a better-connected, richer community. ### Europe / Austria 🇦🇹 ### Sydney **Mario Nebl**\ Topics: JavaScript, Node.js, JS Architecture\ ### Europe / Poland 🇵🇱 ### Krakow **Anna Migas**\ Topics: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Web Animations, Web Performance\ **Kacper Sokołowski**\ Topics: JavaScript, Security, Service Workers\ **Konrad Dzwinel**\ Topics: Developer Tools, JavaScript\ ### Europe / Spain 🇪🇸 ### Novi Sad **Stanislav Deviatov**\ Topics: Kafka, Mulesoft, API Management, Integration Platforms\
items.content_html:
Africa / Nigeria 🇳🇬

Awesome speakers in the programming and design communities

Let's make it more transparent and easy to find awesome speakers for meetups and conferences! This list of speakers, their contact details and the topics they talk about is a start towards this goal.

Please add to the list and help make a better-connected, richer community.

Europe / Austria 🇦🇹

Sydney

Mario Nebl
Topics: JavaScript, Node.js, JS Architecture
https://www.linkedin.com/in/mario-nebl-62b6b3187
